fr.iutvalence.java.projet.spaceinvaders
Class ASCIIDisplay

java.lang.Object
  fr.iutvalence.java.projet.spaceinvaders.ASCIIDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Display
public class ASCIIDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Display

This class allows to print the state of the game into console.
The display is in ASCII arts, that is to say drawable elements are represented by ASCII digit who can be changed by changing constants.
For example : invaders area is represented by many 'M' character.
This class implements Display

Author:
Gallet Guyon
See Also:
Display
